title: how to call the function from IDAPython with passing arguments by manually push them to the stack
content:
would you please tell me how to call the function from IDAPython code ?â€¨

I want to simulate it by manually push to stack as the two arguments and calling the function.

comments.text: Are you interested in getting the result of the decryption for the specific use-case or in general how to use the IDAPython API to emulate/call a function?

Of course I am interested in the general method, but first I would like to know how to write the actual code by IDApython that calls the DecryptFuntion in the specific case above, passing any two arguments (Push).

answers_data.content: Instead of manual pushing, you should be able to use Appcall.
